verse: तस्य यथाभिनहनं प्रमुच्य प्रब्रूयादेतां दिशं गन्धारा एतां दिशं व्रजेति स ग्रामाद्ग्रामं पृच्छन्पण्डितो मेधावी गन्धारानेवोपसंद्येतैवमेवेहाचार्यवान् पुरुषो वेद तस्य तावदेव चिरं यावन्न विमोक्ष्येऽथ संपत्स्य इति॥
meaning: A wise and intelligent blind person who want to go to a place named 'Gandhara' and asks about its direction from individual going from village to village until it reaches 'Gandhara', in a similar manner an ignorant individual(equipped with maya/avidya) shall follow the instructions given by knowledgeable individual(equipped with yogamaya/vidya) to attain knowledge
